snippet.title: Alienware Steam Machine
snippet.description: This small black box takes on living-room game consoles with a combination of native and streaming games.

snippet.title: Origin PC Chronos Steam Machine
snippet.description: Play games in Windows or Steam OS with this high-end PC/console hybrid.

snippet.title: Lenovo Vibe Z
snippet.description: Lenovo's first LTE smartphone comes packed with high-end features, including a 5MP front-facing camera.

snippet.title: Sony Z Ultra Google Play Edition
snippet.description: The Sony Z Ultra Google Play Edition's insanely large size and stratospheric price make the Nexus 5 and Note 3 better options for pure Android power.

snippet.title: Sony Xperia Z Ultra
snippet.description: This phablet packs the Xperia Z's beautiful design in a supersized 6.44-inch frame and looks set to give the Samsung Galaxy Note range a run for its money.

snippet.title: Yale Real Living Touchscreen Z-Wave Deadbolt
snippet.description: If you're looking for a higher level of convenience from your lock, but you don't want to pay monthly fees, then you'll want to give this deadbolt your consideration.

snippet.title: Sony Xperia Tablet Z
snippet.description: Though awash in features, the Xperia Tablet Z's $500 price is a decidedly bitter pill to swallow when a better, cheaper alternative exists for $100 less.

snippet.title: Sony Xperia Z (T-Mobile)
snippet.description: The Sony Xperia Z makes sense if a water-resistant design and excellent photos are a priority, but skip it if you demand blazingly fast performance and long battery life.

snippet.title: The Political Machine 2012 (PC) [Download]
snippet.description: The Political Machine 2012 updates the Beltway players and the hot-button issues, but keeps the same gameplay as its 2008 predecessor.

snippet.title: Zvox Z-Base 555
snippet.description: The Zvox Z-Base 555 has a nearly perfect sound-bar design and a solid feature set, but it won't please critical listeners.
